name: short_offer
description: Present a shortened WebRTC offer.  Fully tested, typescript double-parser.

scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && rimraf docs && mkdir docs && cd docs && mkdir docs && cd .. && rimraf build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir pegjs && mkdir typescript && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd ../src/ts && rimraf generated_code && mkdir generated_code && cd ../..
scripts.site: cp ./src/html/* docs && cp ./build/rollup/viewer.* docs && cp ./src/maintained_artifacts/*.png docs/
scripts.report: node ./src/build_js/record_stats_for_version.js && node ./src/build_js/record_stats_image_for_version.js && rm docs/stats*.png && cp ./src/maintained_artifacts/stats*.png docs/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pegjs && npm run typescript && npm run rollup && npm run site && npm run dist && npm run test && npm run report
